application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.F1 Olive - (exempt). T.3 Tilia - Crown lift to 6m from ground level all round. T.4 Ilex -Trim to shape. T.5 Robinia - 20% Holistic crown reduction/reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.6 Acer Campestre - Deadwood. T.7 Acer Campestre - Deadwood. T.8 Ilex -Trim to shape. T.9 Fagus - Test depth of cavity & deadwood. T.11 Cedrus - Investigate crack on left hand flank & deadwood. T.13 Holm Oak - (exempt).T.14 Robinia - (exempt).T.15 & T.20 Privet - (exempt).T.16 Silver Wattle - (exempt).T.17 Holm Oak - (exempt).T.18 Holm Oak - (exempt).T.19 Prunus Pissardii - (exempt).T.21 Eucalyptus - (exempt).T.27 Gledistia - (exempt).T.22 Silver Wattle - (exempt).T.23 Prunus - (exempt).T.29 Robinia - (exempt).T.31 Gledistia - (exempt).T.33 Gleditsia - (exempt).T.34 & T.38 Sorbus - (exempt).T.35, T.37 & T.39 Conifer hedges - (exempt).T.40 Taxus hedge - (exempt).T.K & T.N Platanus - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points.T.L Cotoneaster - (exempt).T.P Cedrus - lower lateral reduction of outer limbs less than 50mm in diameter, remove crossing branches and deadwood. T.R Quercus - (exempt).T.F2 - Photinias (exempt).
